resources.string: To gather location data consistently, battery optimization for this app should be disabled.

- Tap OK to open battery optimization settings.
- Tap 'Not Optimized' and change it to 'All Apps'.
- Find this app under 'All Apps'.
- Set it to 'Don't optimize'.
- Reopen the app.
This app is currently tracking your location
To activate location tracking only during your work hours, allow the Field Service app to set alarms and reminders.
The Field Service app needs some permissions to get accurate location data consistently. Allow the app to use precise location and at all the time.
The app gathers location data only during working hours and workdays set by your organization.
Physical activity information helps optimize battery life. The app can reduce the number of location updates when no movement is detected.
Allow permissions for the app to access physical activity information.
